languages.text: "Нет! Пускай угроза со стороны ксеносов искоренена, Атлас все еще остается результатом еретических экспериментов Тисифоны. Пока он не будет уничтожен, Дом Орселлио останется заложником своего плачевного положения, продолжая страдать от тирании собственного новатора".

traits.locale_text: "Нет! Пускай угроза со стороны ксеносов искоренена, Атлас все еще остается результатом еретических экспериментов Тисифоны. Пока он не будет уничтожен, Дом Орселлио останется заложником своего плачевного положения, продолжая страдать от тирании собственного новатора".
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "No! The xenos threat may have been eliminated, but the Atlas is still the fruit of Tisiphone's heretical experiments. As long as it survives, House Orsellio will remain a prisoner to its own miserable state and continue to suffer from its Novator's tyranny."
languages.original_text: "Нет! Пускай угроза со стороны ксеносов искоренена, Атлас все еще остается результатом еретических экспериментов Тисифоны. Пока он не будет уничтожен, Дом Орселлио останется заложником своего плачевного положения, продолжая страдать от тирании собственного новатора".

traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "No! The xenos threat may have been eliminated, but the Atlas is still the fruit of Tisiphone's heretical experiments. As long as it survives, House Orsellio will remain a prisoner to its own miserable state and continue to suffer from its Novator's tyranny."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "No! The xenos threat may have been eliminated, but the Atlas is still the fruit of Tisiphone's heretical experiments. As long as it survives, House Orsellio will remain a prisoner to its own miserable state and continue to suffer from its Novator's tyranny."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: 「まだだ！異種族の脅威は排除されたかもしれないが、アトラスはやはり、ティシフォンの異端実験の成果物だ。それがある限り、オーセリオ家はみじめな立場に囚われたまま、ノベイターの残虐さに苦しみ続けることになる」
languages.original_text: "No! The xenos threat may have been eliminated, but the Atlas is still the fruit of Tisiphone's heretical experiments. As long as it survives, House Orsellio will remain a prisoner to its own miserable state and continue to suffer from its Novator's tyranny."

traits.locale_text: 「まだだ！異種族の脅威は排除されたかもしれないが、アトラスはやはり、ティシフォンの異端実験の成果物だ。それがある限り、オーセリオ家はみじめな立場に囚われたまま、ノベイターの残虐さに苦しみ続けることになる」
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: “或许异形的威胁确实消灭了，但无论如何，圣仪依然是提西福涅异端实验的成果。只要它还在，奥赛罗家族就会继续囚禁在这样的悲惨境地之中，继续忍受大族长的暴政。”
languages.original_text: "No! The xenos threat may have been eliminated, but the Atlas is still the fruit of Tisiphone's heretical experiments. As long as it survives, House Orsellio will remain a prisoner to its own miserable state and continue to suffer from its Novator's tyranny."

traits.locale_text: “或许异形的威胁确实消灭了，但无论如何，圣仪依然是提西福涅异端实验的成果。只要它还在，奥塞罗家族就会继续囚禁在这样的悲惨境地之中，继续忍受大族长的暴政。”
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: « Non ! Le menace xénos est peut-être éliminée, mais l'Atlas reste le fruit des expériences hérétiques de Tisiphone. Tant qu'il survivra, la maison Orsellio restera prisonnière de sa propre misère et de la tyrannie de sa Novator. »
languages.original_text: "No! The xenos threat may have been eliminated, but the Atlas is still the fruit of Tisiphone's heretical experiments. As long as it survives, House Orsellio will remain a prisoner to its own miserable state and continue to suffer from its Novator's tyranny."

traits.locale_text: « Non ! Le menace xénos est peut-être éliminée, mais l'Atlas reste le fruit des expériences hérétiques de Tisiphone. Tant qu'il survivra, la maison Orsellio restera prisonnière de sa propre misère et de la tyrannie de sa Novator. »
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: «¡No! Puede que hayamos eliminado la amenaza de los xenos, pero el Atlas sigue siendo fruto de los experimentos heréticos de Tisiphone. Mientras siga existiendo, la casa Orsellio seguirá prisionera de su miseria y nunca escapará de la tiranía de su Novator».
languages.original_text: "No! The xenos threat may have been eliminated, but the Atlas is still the fruit of Tisiphone's heretical experiments. As long as it survives, House Orsellio will remain a prisoner to its own miserable state and continue to suffer from its Novator's tyranny."

traits.locale_text: «¡No! Puede que hayamos eliminado la amenaza de los xenos, pero el Atlas sigue siendo fruto de los experimentos heréticos de Tisiphone. Mientras siga existiendo, la casa Orsellio seguirá prisionera de su miseria y nunca escapará de la tiranía de su Novator».
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Nein! Die Xenos-Gefahr mag eliminiert sein, doch der Atlas ist noch immer die Frucht von Tisiphones ketzerischen Experimenten. Solange er lebt, bleibt Haus Orsellio ein Gefangener seiner eigenen elenden Vergangenheit und leidet weiter unter der Tyrannei seiner Novatorin."
languages.original_text: "No! The xenos threat may have been eliminated, but the Atlas is still the fruit of Tisiphone's heretical experiments. As long as it survives, House Orsellio will remain a prisoner to its own miserable state and continue to suffer from its Novator's tyranny."

traits.locale_text: "Nein! Die Xenos-Gefahr mag eliminiert sein, doch der Atlas ist noch immer die Frucht von Tisiphones ketzerischen Experimenten. So lange er erlebt, bleibt Haus Orsellio ein Gefangener seiner eigenen elenden Vergangenheit und leidet weiter unter der Tyrannei seiner Novatorin."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Hayır! Zeno tehdidi ortadan kalkmış olsa da Atlas, hâlâ Tisiphone'nin kâfirce deneylerinin eseri. Atlas yok edilmediği sürece Orsellio Hanesi, bu sefaletin kölesi olup Rota Reisi'nin tiranlığına mahkûm olacak."
languages.original_text: "No! The xenos threat may have been eliminated, but the Atlas is still the fruit of Tisiphone's heretical experiments. As long as it survives, House Orsellio will remain a prisoner to its own miserable state and continue to suffer from its Novator's tyranny."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır! Zeno tehdidi ortadan kalkmış olsa da, Atlas hâlâ Tisiphone'nin kâfirce deneylerinin eseri. Atlas yok edilmediği sürece Orsellio Hanesi, bu sefaletin kölesi olup Rota Reisi'nin tiranlığına mahkûm kalacak."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader
